subject: Purim
object: Celebration of Jewish deliverance as told in the Book of Esther (megillah)

subject: Purim
object: Listening to the Book of Esther in synagogue; sending food parcels and giving charity; dressing up in costume; eating a festive meal; parties and parades (Adloyada); drinking alcoholic beverages, especially wine

subject: Purim
object: 14th day of Adar (in Jerusalem and all ancient walled cities, 15th of Adar)

subject: Purim
object: Hanukkah, as a rabbinically decreed Jewish holiday

subject: Purim
object: A photograph of a small, old book with Hebrew text and an illustration on the right-hand page. 18th-century manuscript of the prayer of Al HaNissim on the miracles of Purim
